ellipse.style: stroke-width: 27px; stroke: rgb(0, 44, 255); fill: rgba(193, 32, 32, 0); fill-opacity: 0;

path.style: stroke-width: 27px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: bevel; stroke: rgb(0, 44, 255); fill: rgba(193, 32, 32, 0); fill-opacity: 0;

line.style: stroke-width: 27px; stroke-linejoin: bevel; stroke: rgb(0, 44, 255); fill: rgba(193, 32, 32, 0); fill-opacity: 0;

text.style: fill: rgba(193, 32, 32, 0); fill-opacity: 0; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17.5px; stroke-width: 10.1429px; white-space: pre; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 2.43163px 9.86614px;

ellipse.style: stroke-width: 27px; stroke: rgb(187, 0, 255); transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%; fill: rgba(193, 32, 32, 0); fill-opacity: 0;

path.style: stroke-width: 27px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: bevel; stroke: rgb(187, 0, 255); transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%; fill: rgba(193, 32, 32, 0); fill-opacity: 0;
